entries.journal_entry_description: You're doing some crafting for Gendra.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Gendra wants you to make seven small glasses for his friend who owns a cantina. Use your mineral survey device to find gemstone, then double click the name of the gemstone to search for and the survey tool will find it. Move to the highest percentage spot you can find and survey again. Repeat this process until you are happy with the percentage, usually 50% or higher is a very good spot. Once you have arrived there use the 'Get Sample' button in the lower left hand corner of the mineral survey device to acquire some gemstone. Check the crafting tool to see how much you need.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that you've crafted some small glasses you should take them to Gendra's friend Lurval, who usually hangs around the cantina.
